Posted By: darkfury (10/10/2009 11:47:44 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This guy is freakishly good. Works amazingly well with [Ob Nixilis, the Fallen](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ob Nixilis, the Fallen) and [Warp World](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Warp World). Here is why.  
  
When 1 card in your hand is worth 4 on the field, and using [Lotus Cobra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Cobra), [Oracle of Mul Daya](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oracle of Mul Daya), [Verdant Catacombs](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Verdant Catacombs), [Harrow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Harrow), to ramp up your mana by second turn getting one out, then your already set up for a Warp World. Playing out your hand until about 4th turn (btw Oracle lets you play a land card flipped up at the start of your turn before you draw, and then again if its another land, so you have a better chance of drawing the cards you need, not just land), then using Warp World now, when you have 20+ permanents on the field (thanks mostly to Siege-Gang Commander and Oracle of Mul Daya) means your almost definitely going to get atleast 1 Ob Nix, and 1 Siege Gang Commander. Then depending on how many land you drew, you can drop your opponent to very low lif... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

When 1 card in your hand is worth 4 on the field, and using Lotus Cobra, Oracle of Mul Daya, Verdant Catacombs, Harrow, to ramp up your mana by second turn getting one out, then your already set up for a Warp World. Playing out your hand until about 4th turn (btw Oracle lets you play a land card flipped up at the start of your turn before you draw, and then again if its another land, so you have a better chance of drawing the cards you need, not just land), then using Warp World now, when you have 20+ permanents on the field (thanks mostly to Siege-Gang Commander and Oracle of Mul Daya) means your almost definitely going to get atleast 1 Ob Nix, and 1 Siege Gang Commander. Then depending on how many land you drew, you can drop your opponent to very low lif... (see all)
